name: Word Invaders
overview: Test your typing skills and save the planet from invaders from space! Four levels of difficulty to allow you to continue to increase in skill and always feel the challenge. Word Invaders is an Educational game, developed and published by Academy Software, which was released in 1983. THE MOST EFFECTIVE WAY TO LEARN TOUCH TYPING! WORD INVADERS puts real excitement into your touch typing practice while rein- forcing proper typing techniques.
